name: Slippers of Agility
description: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
3 main attack damage to agility heroes
1.35 main attack damage to universal heroes
trivia: This item is based on the Slippers of Agility from Warcraft 3

recentChanges.description: No longer builds into Poor Man's Shield. Reduced gold cost from 150 to 135
